pr_title: Scope Which Folders in /eng Trigger Core CI

timeline.message: Scope which folders in /eng trigger Core CI

timeline.bodyText: We might want to just exclude eng/versioning/ instead of splitting this up like this. If we keep this as include filters we should also add eng/common to the include list.
timeline.author: weshaggard

replies.bodyText: Currently there is more to exclude than include under /eng which is why I went this direction. Can add /common to the list of includes in the next commit.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText:
Hrm, I'm with Wes on this actually because one of the reasons we have core trigger on eng changes is to pick up issues when there are changes there. By using includes rather than excludes we may potentially miss things that are added over time.
If the cause for thrashing is changes in the eng/versioning directory then we should just exclude that.
replies.author: mitchdenny

replies.bodyText: I also added eng/jacoco-test-coverage as this generates a lot of CI churn as it will update when eng/versioning updates without directly affecting Core. (It's also only used for reporting purposes)
replies.author: alzimmermsft
